#summary How to use exportpriv
= Introduction =

This page explains how to use exportpriv


= Details =
{{{
java ExportPriv <keystore> <alias> <password> > exported-pkcs8.key
}}}

The private key is being exported as PKCS#8 PEM format. To get it into the RSA format that works with Apache (see below) you can issue the following openssl command:

{{{
openssl pkcs8 -inform PEM -nocrypt -in exported-pkcs8.key -out exported.key
}}}
